name: PhysicsN
description: Create, blast, change gravity, slow down and stop time, break up cubes into the smallest particles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 128 MB available space
